Articles.Content: I pick soyuz 1 to start I will research some of the more famous ones and do those over time - there are 5 suit variations I can do for each at the minute, 2 EVA 3 IVA.

Nice!

Respect to Vladimir Komarov...

RIP Vladimir Komarov...
Soyuz 1 patches added
Is it Ben Kerbflec in the famous Kerbal movie Kerbalgeddon ?

Kerbalgeddon - I am so doing that now LMFAO

Edited March 6, 2014 by Green Skull

Is it Ben Kerbflec in the famous Kerbal movie Kerbalgeddon ?

As the kerbalgeddon mission gets ready for liftoff...

[/url

Ben Kerbflec realises they are going without him!

Edited March 6, 2014 by Green Skull

Kerbal ranking system - give your kerbals ranks or jobs i.e. Commander, Pilot, Mission Specialist by using specific colour suits, helmets etc - colours most likely based on the star trek colour / rank system.

Can I suggest that you work with Nereid working on the Final Frontier project? I've done a few of the custom graphics for that one (which aren't working at the moment), including ribbons for Kerbonauts qualified for specific roles (and I'm happy to come up with more ribbons, if you want to suggest them too).

Either way. I've also got a whole set of rank insignia ready to go, if you'd like for me to pass it along?

Can I suggest that you work with Nereid working on the Final Frontier project? I've done a few of the custom graphics for that one (which aren't working at the moment), including ribbons for Kerbonauts qualified for specific roles (and I'm happy to come up with more ribbons, if you want to suggest them too).

Either way. I've also got a whole set of rank insignia ready to go, if you'd like for me to pass it along?

The thought had already crossed my mind as I have final frontier on my personal install and if I'm honest was the inspiration for me creating some rough versions. Any help would be much appreciated and working with Nerid would be an honour!

Going to add more film packs including:

2001 a Kerbal Odyssey for all you monolith fans

Edited March 6, 2014 by Green Skull

I will research the colours / style of the gloves a bit but I cannot change the shape as this is dictated by the original model mesh or shape which isn't being changed.

I didn't mean the shape but the colors. Also a 2001 space suit suit would be cool, if we could somehow modify the models (And you obviously need a murderous AI) and Tintin Suits would be funny (And the ESA would especially like them)

Edited March 6, 2014 by hieywiey

I didn't mean the shape but the colors. Also a 2001 space suit suit would be cool, if we could somehow modify the models (And you obviously need a murderous AI) and Tintin Suits would be funny (And the ESA would especially like them)

Colours I can change! I'm currently working on a new white IVA suit for the Apollo pack. This can then be adapted to other things e.g. a 2001 blue IVA suit.

As for making a kerbal style 2001 EVA suit... Not impossible

Here you go. From the top:

General

Lieutenant General

Major General

Brigadier

Colonel

Lieutenant Colonel

Major

Lieutenant

Second Lieutenant

Chief Warrant Officer 5

Chief Warrant Officer 4

Chief Warrant Officer 3

Chief Warrant Officer 2

Warrant Officer

I reckon these would be the only ranks that would be allowed near the controls of a spaceship.

I can get these in larger resolution if you like as I have them saved as Fireworks PNG's. I have them in this size to eventually fit with the Final Frontier ribbons.

Excellent thank you. If possible could I have them in the larger size so that I can scale as I need. I have a place to put ribbons and I can incorporate the insignia's into arm patches and helmet decals

Is there any chance that, upon loading the game could learn what capsule is unlocked, and produce THAT capsules patch.. EG at game start I get FASA's Mercury Pod, by default all new Kerbals get the Mercury Patch. Then when start a new game after unlocking the Gemini, I switch to my default texture being that with the Gemini patch?

Suit Request. The Last Starfighter. Primarily Khaki Tan with a Cream/Neutral/True White Stripe.

http://ansionnachfionn.files.wordpress.com/2011/05/the_last_starfighter-1024x768.jpg?w=604&h=453

http://www.fearthegooberzilla.com/pics/starfighter04.JPG

http://www.fearthegooberzilla.com/pics/starfighter02.JPG

TIA!

Pappystein

Is there any chance that, upon loading the game could learn what capsule is unlocked, and produce THAT capsules patch.. EG at game start I get FASA's Mercury Pod, by default all new Kerbals get the Mercury Patch. Then when start a new game after unlocking the Gemini, I switch to my default texture being that with the Gemini patch?

This is a longer term goal but for the minute all suit variations have to be assigned manually

You know I've never seen this... There is actually a fair bit to that suit but I'm not saying no.

Edited March 7, 2014 by Green Skull
After a lot (and I mean a lot!) of messing about I present the Dark Tinted Visor

I have a suit request... BSG Reboot!

And insignia too!

It would be especially cool if you could change the helmets, but I know that's a bit much

I have a suit request... BSG Reboot! It would be especially cool if you could change the helmets, but I know that's a bit much

I don't know if there is a way to mod the standard kerbal model. Believe me if I could I would make storm troopers, darth vader, BSG including cylons the spacesuits from Alien... First I would improve the standard model and make it quite a bit nicer!

Again I'm not saying no but I need to get the first packs out.

Ahh this is a bio suit. Well its more than possible. I think you misunderstood me on buzz lightyear - I was thinking possibly a suit in that style somewhere down the line as the science reports log changer keeps giving me "TO INFINTY AND BEYOND" everytime I do an EVA report over kerbin lol.
